item.content:encoded:
有点追求:
Google Stadia上游戏将会比本地更快以及更迅捷
新闻来源：https://www.pcgamesn.com/stadia/negative-latency-prediction，“Ultimately, we think in a year or two we’ll have games that are running faster and feel more responsive in the cloud than they do locally,” Bakar says to Edge, “regardless of how powerful the local machine is.”
原理大概就是一些应对机制的预测可以协助服务器更快响应，我想了想既视战略，又想了想哪怕是带点动作要素的RPG，谷歌这牛逼吹的不错
